alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:52PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, Avoyelles and northeastern Vernon Parishes through 115 PM CDT... At 1252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bordelonville to near Slagle. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Marksville, Simmesport, Boyce, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Alexandria International Airport, Slagle, Effie, Hineston, Lena, Ball, Cottonport, Colfax, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Plaucheville and Tioga. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 66 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
